articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: North America Prepares for 2024 Total Solar Eclipse - VOA Learning English
articles.description: A total solar eclipse takes place in North America on April 8. Millions of people hope to fully experience the event, which is expected to darken the sky for more than four minutes. The path of totality will cover areas of Mexico, the U.S. and Canada.
articles.content:
